title: What K-pop song is super popular but you dislike? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here I go… these are my opinions and they aren’t “not good” they just are overrated.  Fancy was good the first listen or so but after like 3 I couldn’t listen to it and took it out of my playlist. For me it’s one of twices worst songs. Feel special was amazing and my favorite song by them and I think it deserves the hype fancy got. I think fancy just got hype because it’s different then their other songs.  this is a confusing post because I actually really like the song and listen to it often but in my opinion it’s not the best red velvet songs. I like bad boy or red flavor better. This is just my opinion but i hear a lot of people say this would be their best song if they got better promotions and I disagree.  I love Dalla Dalla and wannabe they are probably in my top 10 favorite songs. But i thought icy was the debut song for some time because most groups make better songs as they go. By wannabe was amazing so I feel like they learned their lesson. Okay now I’m going to name songs that I think deserve the hype  The dance break, the chorus, the choreography, the rap. Everything was perfect. This was probably the best song in my opinion to happen to kpop. It’s iconic. The way they jumped from as if it’s your last to this blows my mind. I feel like is deserved to be the first kpop group song to reach 1 billion views.  this is by far twices best song. It didn’t get hate fro a reason. The girls looked amazing, their outfits looked amazing, dahyuns rap was iconic, and just every thing about it was perfect.  Wannabe by itzy was amazing. It did take a listen or two to like but I loved it so much. It’s in my top 5 favorite songs. I love the message but I hate that they are getting a large amount of hate for their visuals, vocals, to different concept when the whole point of their music is that they don’t care what people say and they are different.  I introduced my friend in America to kpop and she wasn’t really interested but she said she did like kill this love. I never got the hate around this song. It’s similar yes, but kpop groups shouldn’t get hate for having similar songs. Especially since This was only their second song after a completely different concept (as if it’s your last).  I don’t even stan momoland but I love this song. It’s amazing. The vocals in it kill me every time and the chorus/ choreography is addicting.

Just because I don’t like them, doesn’t mean they are bad. Just because I dislike a part, find it annoying or just hated it doesn’t mean it is that, it’s just what it sounded like to me. Fancy - Twice I’m not a big fan of Twice’s music, but I really didn’t like Fancy. The chorus annoys me and I think Feel Special is better. My favourite song of Twice is Breakthrough. But Fancy’s choreography is great. Bon Bon Chocalat - Everglow It was meh. I remember everyone was hyping their debut up and I thought it was just okay but I just don’t like it now. I think the chorus isn’t as good as everyone says it is. Adios - Everglow I enjoy some heavier songs but I did not like this one. It was loud, the rap kinda annoyed me and I also wasn’t a fan of the choreography. Hit - Seventeen I did not like Home, I thought it was my least favourite song of Seventeen. That changed when Hit came. It’s so loud and sounds a bit more like noise to me. Loved Fear though. Dalla Dalla - ITZY It got mixed reactions but then everyone started liking it and I don’t; It’s too annoying to me. I also wasn’t a fan of the MV. Didn’t get the hype of their debut. Icy - ITZY Like it better then Dalla Dalla but I still don’t like it. Wasn’t a big fan of the choreography either. I was kinda disappointed with female rookie groups in 2019 to be honest. I didn’t like any specific female rookies and I’ve listened to a lot. Wave - ATEEZ Not a fan of ATEEZ’s music in general. But I disliked this song more then the others. Kinda found the song boring. Treasure - ATEEZ Lots of people were hyping their debut but I didn’t like it. Pirate King has grown on me and I’m obsessed with Hongjoong’s verse but I did not like Treasure at all. Humph! - Pentagon Not that popular but still. I love Pentagon but since Shine their songs have been a hit or miss for me. I didn’t like Naughty Boy but I loved Cosmo and Sha La La. But I really didn’t like Humph! As If It’s Your Last - Blackpink I like all their songs except this one. Too cute, didn’t like Lisa’a rap. Didn’t like Jisoo’s curled hair with the hair clip. Didn’t like Lisa’s “마지막처럼 마-마-마지막처럼마지막 밤인 것처럼 love마지막처럼 마-마-마지막처럼내일 따윈 없는 것처럼” La Vie en Rose - IZ*ONE It isn’t that bad but not a fan. Much preferred Violeta. Chorus kinda felt empty and felt boring. Roller Coaster - Chungha Voice kinda felt annoying in this song. Didn’t like the pink outfit. Didn’t like Chungha’s short hair, probably a wig but still. Just kinda annoying in general. Birthday - Somi Felt like a mess. Sometimes too cute. Random beat drop I didn’t like. Didn’t like the rap part. I know it’s supposed to be sassy but I didn’t like the “Oops you’re not invited” part. Felt like she was a mean girl and sounded too cocky for my liking. I know it’s supposed to be that way. Siren - Sunmi Thought it was empty and I just don’t like it. Love Gashina though and Heroine is growing on me. Everyday - Winner Hated it. The autotune was too much. One of the worst K-Pop songs for me. Millions - Winner Boring, too slow. Ah Yeah - Winner Same as Millions. Boogie Up - WJSN It's not that popular, but I don't like it. It just annoys me so much. Soso - Winner Sorry for the amount of Winner songs in this, I just haven't liked anything from them since 2018. Anyway, thought the song was boring and annoying.
